ratings.comment: Prof Campell's lectures were not mandatory. We read 10 plays this semester, but you were able to get away with reading a summary and getting 100% on the weekly quizzes. I attended every lecture because I found them interesting and entertaining. He assigns light work for the 3 credit sections and each exam was online and open note, easy to get 100.

I took the comm b listing of this class, which requires a lot of reading and writing because of requirements. Scott was also my TA which I thought was weird at first, but he is an awesome person. He knows everyone is there for the comm b, so he grades easy and is very understanding. Lectures were thought provoking and captivating. Would suggest.
